cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is an immaculate 2015 Subaru WRX STi with only 5000 miles on it. Leather seats, AWD, 300HP.
This is an immaculate 2016 Chevrolet Corvette with only 300 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
